title: Victor Vran Motorhead Through the Ages MULTi15-PLAZA
description:
P-R-E-S-E-N-T-S

Victor Vran: Motorhead Through The Ages *MULTi15* (c) EuroVideo Medien
Release Date: 06/2017 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action
Motrhead: Through the Ages is a wild tour through the mythos of the
loudest band in the world! Bring the mighty Snaggletooth back to
life with the help of Lemmy and Lloyd Kaufman! Harness the powers of
the immortal Motrhead to defeat frightening new enemies in three
demon-infested worlds intertwined with the songs of the band. Slay
your opponents to the rhythm of the band's greatest riffs Take the
hunt to 3 unique worlds, inspired by Motrhead Discover the
Monuments of Rock New weapon classes - Revolvers and Guitars
Unleash new Motrhead themed demon powers 3 New outfits inspired by
Lemmy, Phil and Mikkey Clash with Scorpions, Hellhounds and Succubi
New bosses from the world of Motrhead 20 new rock themed destiny
cards Guest starring legendary director Lloyd Kaufman Don't forget
to powerslide

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/462290/

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!

Notes: This is also known as the "Overkill Edition" and the
following DLC is included:

> Victor Vran: Wanderer Outfit
> Victor Vran: Original Soundtrack and Art Book
> Victor Vran: Highlander Outfit
> Victor Vran: Cauldron of Chaos Map
> Victor Vran: Tome of Souls Weapon
> Victor Vran: Motorhead Through The Ages
> Victor Vran: Fractured Worlds
Included languages: *

> English
> German
> French
> Italian
> Spanish
> Brazilian Portuguese
> Polish
> Czech
> Hungarian
> Bulgarian
> Russian
> Turkish
> Korean
> Japanese
> Simplified Chinese

* Use the included language.changer.exe to switch to desired language

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

CODEX - CPY - ENiGMA - SiMPLEX - ACTiVATED - ADDONiA

Coming soon
